title: Starts—General
body: At the start, swimmers shall take their positions on the starting platform, the starting edge, or in the water as appropriate. See [[GEN-1.2]] for false starts.

title: False Start
body: Any swimmer starting before the starting signal shall be disqualified. The Starter shall recall the field if necessary. Cross‑reference: [[FR-2.4]], [[BR-3.3]].

title: Freestyle—Turns
body: Freestyle turns are not prescribed; the swimmer must touch the wall at the end of each length. See also [[GEN-1.2]].

title: Breaststroke—Stroke Cycle
body: From the beginning of the first arm stroke after the start and after each turn, the swimmer’s head shall break the surface before the hands turn inward at the widest part of the second stroke. See [[GEN-1.2]] for false starts.
